title: Werewolves Don't Celebrate Hanukkah
description: There are two wolves inside of you: one eats all the latkes, and the other hides the presents.A charming yet informative book about Hanukkah and its traditions, and how to share them with werewolves.Written by acclaimed fantasy author Michelle Franklin, and lovingly illustrated by famed cartoonist and werewolf wrangler Jonathan Burrello.
author: Michelle Franklin
